name: Bowling Alleys
tcc: R for face-to-face transactions.\nT for nonâ€“face-to-face transactions.
description:
Merchants that operate bowling alleys for entertainment, and may
accept Mastercard cards for rental fees, pro shop purchases,
refreshments, or usage fees.
Merchants located within the bowling alley that are separately
managed must be classified with the appropriate MCC for that type
of business.
For example, a restaurant located within a bowling alley must use
MCC 5812; a bar must use MCC 5813.
